title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Code to Cloud: Building AppSec Programs with AWS (SEC222)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从代码到云：使用 AWS 构建应用安全程序 (SEC222)
abstract: Building application security programs requires the right tools, processes, and expertise. This session provides a practical roadmap for establishing and scaling AppSec programs using AWS services and AI-powered capabilities. Learn how to define security goals and culture, develop threat models, and find vulnerabilities throughout the SDLC with Kiro and Amazon Inspector. Discover practical strategies for shift-left security, continuous vulnerability management, and building sustainable programs that work for organizations of any size.
abstract_cn: 构建应用程序安全计划需要正确的工具、流程和专业知识。本次会议提供了一个实用的路线图，用于使用 AWS 服务和 AI 驱动的能力来建立和扩展 AppSec 计划。了解如何定义安全目标和文化、开发威胁模型，以及使用 Kiro 和 Amazon Inspector 在整个 SDLC 中发现漏洞。探索左移安全、持续漏洞管理的实用策略，以及构建适用于任何规模组织的可持续计划。
